product.title: Add A Frame to your Oxford Pennant
product.description: Add a frame to your 9"x27" pennant or vintage pennant! Frames come in black, white, and natural wood finish. Final dimension: 12"x34" (for 9"x27", vintage may vary) Note: a frame must be purchased in the same transaction as a separate pennant. Email us if you want a frame for an existing Oxford flag. Currently the framing process takes approximately 10-15 business days as long as the pennant is in-stock. Price includes UPS ground shipping within the Continental US. International customers, please contact us for more info. All frames are final sale. * We also offer framing options for our camp flags!
product.descriptionHtml:
Add a frame to your 9"x27" pennant or vintage pennant! Frames come in black, white, and natural wood finish. 

Final dimension: 12"x34" (for 9"x27", vintage may vary) 

Note: a frame must be purchased in the same transaction as a separate pennant. Email us if you want a frame for an existing Oxford flag. Currently the framing process takes approximately 10-15 business days as long as the pennant is in-stock.

Price includes UPS ground shipping within the Continental US. International customers, please contact us for more info. All frames are final sale.

* We also offer framing options for our camp flags!
